changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text.
changelog.md.Possibilité de modifier l'état de survei: Ability to change the monitoring status
changelog.md.Refonte complete du moteur de communicat: Complete overhaul of the communication engine with Netatmo
changelog.md.cette version est une reecriture complet: this version is a complete rewrite of the plugin, so there is an impact on widgets (which is now standard in the core, major change in the display of this one)
changelog.md.Il est vivement conseillé de supprimer l: It is strongly recommended to delete the equipment created and to redo a synchronization
changelog.md.Correction du framework Netatmo (nouvell: Correction of the Netatmo framework (new data returned by Netatmo not taken into account in their code)

index.md.Plugin permettant de récupérer les infor: Plugin to retrieve information from Netatmo Security equipment
index.md.Une fois le plugin installé, il vous fau: Once the plugin is installed, you need to enter your Netatmo connection information
index.md.permet de synchroniser Jeedom avec votre: allows you to synchronize Jeedom with your Netamo account to automatically discover your Netamo equipment. AT
index.md.faire après avoir sauvegardé les paramèt: do after saving the previous settings
index.md.Identifiez vous, avec votre mail et mot: Identify yourself, with your email and password
index.md.Remplissez les champs \"Name\" et \"Desc: Fill in the "Name" and "Description" fields (whatever you put in it doesn't matter)
index.md.Puis tout en bas de la page cochez la ca: Then at the very bottom of the page check the box "I accept the terms of use" then click on "Create
index.md.Recuperer les informations \"CLient id\": Recover the "CLient id" and "Secret client" information and copy them in the configuration part of the plugin in Jeedom (see previous chapter)
index.md.La configuration des équipements Netatmo: The configuration of Netatmo devices is accessible from the plugin menu -> Security -> Netatmo Security
index.md.Une fois que vous cliquez sur un équipem: Once you click on a device you will find here all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.En dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.la configuration avancée de la commande: advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.Je n'ai pas les évenements en temps réel: I do not have the events in real time but after 15min
index.md.Pour avoir un retour en temps réel des é: To have a real-time return of events (fire alarm triggering, person passing in front of the camera ..) you MUST ABSOLUTELY have your jeedom have an external URL in https with a valid certificate on port 443 (and only this port)
index.md.C'est une obligation imposé par netatmo: It is an obligation imposed by netatmo
index.md.Attention si vous avez mis un code cette: Attention if you put a code this function is not possible by the jeedom plugin
